sentences.pinyin: Wǒ yào dǎbàn wǒ de fángjiān.
sentences.translation: I want to decorate my room.

sentences.simplifiedText: 每年圣诞节,她都会用心打扮她的整个房子,使每个角落都充满节日的气氛。
sentences.traditionalText: 每年聖誕節,她都會用心打扮她的整個房子,使每個角落都充滿節日的氣氛。
sentences.pinyin: Měi nián shèngdàn jié, tā dū huì yòngxīn dǎbàn tā de zhěnggè fángzi, shǐ měi gè jiǎoluò dōu chōngmǎn jiérì de qìfēn.
sentences.translation: Every Christmas, she would carefully decorate her entire house, making every corner filled with the festive atmosphere.

sentences.simplifiedText: 她每天早上都要打扮自己。
sentences.traditionalText: 她每天早上都要打扮自己。
sentences.pinyin: Tā měitiān zǎoshang dūyào dǎbàn zìjǐ.
sentences.translation: She makes herself up every morning.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在工作场所，人们会注意到你的打扮，这可以解释为你对工作的认真态度。
sentences.traditionalText: 在工作場所，人們會注意到你的打扮，這可以解釋為你對工作的認真態度。
sentences.pinyin: Zài gōngzuò chǎngsuǒ, rénmén huì zhùyì dào nǐ de dǎbàn, zhè kěyǐ jiěshì wéi nǐ duì gōngzuò de rènzhēn tàidù.
sentences.translation: In the workplace, people will notice your dress, which can be interpreted as your serious attitude towards work.

sentences.pinyin: Tā de dǎbàn hěn xīyǐn rén.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在我们的派对上，每个人都必须按照70年代的风格打扮。
sentences.traditionalText: 在我們的派對上，每個人都必須按照70年代的風格打扮。
sentences.pinyin: Zài wǒmen de pàiduì shàng, měi gè rén dōu bìxū ànzhào 70 niándài de fēnggé dǎbàn.
sentences.translation: At our party, everyone must dress in the style of the 70s.
